Determine Color Group for Country

Source: R/wp_plot_utils_bar_scatter.r
in_get_color_group.Rd

Internal function that assigns a color group to a country based on its ISO code. Supports multiple classification schemes (regional, economic, etc.).

Used by: in_create_color_mapping, in_create_scatter_colors Uses: in_get_ctry_categories

Classification schemes:

  • Region: Major geographical regions

  • Subregion: Detailed geographical regions

  • Center-Periphery: Economic classification

  • Hydrocarbon: Exporter/importer status

Usage

in_get_color_group(iso_code, scheme)

Developed by Benjamin Peeters.
